title: An Interview with Brigadier Keith Rossi

abstract: Keith Rossi was 15 when he went to sign up but the army made him 20.
description: Brigadier Keith Rossi went to join up but needed to lie about his age to do so. He tells of his time in the army with humour, capturing the cameraderie that helped alleviate the horror of war. In his time serving, he went from the Middle East, to New Guinea and, later, Vietnam, from Private to Brigadier.
